graph:
graph LR
Brain_Computer_Interfaces["Brain-Computer Interfaces (★★★)"] -- "translate neural activity into commands (★★★)" --> Endovascular_BCIs["Endovascular BCIs (★★★)"]
Endovascular_BCIs -- "offer minimally invasive alternative (★★★)" --> Traditional_Invasive_BCIs["Traditional Invasive BCIs (★★★)"]
Traditional_Invasive_BCIs -- "require craniotomy (★★★)" --> Surgical_Risks["Surgical Risks (★★★)"]
Endovascular_BCIs -- "demonstrate stable neural recordings (★★★)" --> Preclinical_Studies["Preclinical Studies (★★★)"]
Preclinical_Studies -- "utilize ovine models (★★★)" --> Ovine_Model["Ovine Model (★★★)"]
Ovine_Model -- "show stable impedance (★★★)" --> Electrode_Stability["Electrode Stability (★★★)"]
Endovascular_BCIs -- "reduce invasiveness (★★★)" --> Safety_Profiles["Safety Profiles (★★★)"]
Safety_Profiles -- "improve compared to traditional methods (★★★)" --> Neural_Recording_Fidelity["Neural Recording Fidelity (★★★)"]
Neural_Recording_Fidelity -- "comparable to invasive methods (★★★)" --> Clinical_Outcomes["Clinical Outcomes (★★★)"]
Clinical_Outcomes -- "show promising results in ALS patients (★★★)" --> ALS_Patients["ALS Patients (★★★)"]
Endovascular_BCIs -- "face challenges like thrombosis risk (★★★)" --> Thrombosis_Risk["Thrombosis Risk (★★★)"]
Thrombosis_Risk -- "impacts long-term electrode stability (★★★)" --> Long_Term_Stability["Long-Term Stability (★★★)"]
Long_Term_Stability -- "requires optimization of signal processing (★★★)" --> Signal_Processing["Signal Processing (★★★)"]
Signal_Processing -- "enhances electrode biocompatibility (★★★)" --> Electrode_Biocompatibility["Electrode Biocompatibility (★★★)"]
Endovascular_BCIs -- "utilize Stentrode device (★★★)" --> Stentrode_Device["Stentrode Device (★★★)"]
Stentrode_Device -- "achieves high-frequency neural signals (★★★)" --> High_Frequency_Signals["High-Frequency Signals (★★★)"]
High_Frequency_Signals -- "recorded in gamma bands (★★★)" --> Gamma_Bands["Gamma Bands (★★★)"]
Endovascular_BCIs -- "show potential for stimulation (★★★)" --> Stimulation_Potential["Stimulation Potential (★★★)"]
Stimulation_Potential -- "remains under investigation (★★★)" --> Investigation["Investigation (★★★)"]

Brain_Computer_Interfaces -. "does_not translate neural activity into commands (★★★)" .-> Traditional_Invasive_BCIs
